Translations.Text: Mi solemnly jxur Lord de orient okcident; ni est able
Al substitute put popol your met; ni neniam defeated
Do let them blunder lud ili meet tag awaiting them
Ke est tag ili ven graves en a hurry as se herded (sacrificial) altar
Kun their okul subdued fi kovr them. Ke est tag awaiting them
Ni send Noah his popol Vi avert your popol painful retribution aflikt them
Li dir O my popol mi est manifest warner al vi
Al vigl vi ke vi worship DI reverence Him obe me
Li tiam forgive vi your pek respite vi por predetermined period! plej assuredly di appointment neniam delayed once gxi est due vi nur kon
Li dir My Lord mi invit my popol nokt tag
my invitation nur increased their aversion
Whenever mi invit them forgiven Vi ili ej their fingr their orel kovr themselves kun their vest insist torn arrogant
Tiam mi proklam them loudly mi parol al them privately
Mi dir Implore your Lord forgiveness; Li Forgiving
